question: 詳しい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>detailed</kanji>? It's also <vocabulary>detailed</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: When something is <vocabulary>detailed</vocabulary> it is made up of a huge <reading>qua</reading>ntity (<ja>くわ</ja>) of little things. And if you're an <vocabulary>expert</vocabulary> on something, you'll have a huge quantity of knowledge, too.
